name: Pink Princess Tumblr Theme
description:
WWW.POTTERR.TUMBLR.COM

**IMPORTANT**

To make this layout work ONLY FOR TUMBLR. you click on the stylish icon and select edit under the theme title there is an option that says.  "Applies to" select "URLs on the domain" from the drop down menu then type into the space "www.tumblr.com" then it will work for tumblr.
